original_title: Il suo nome era Pot... ma... lo chiamavano Allegria
overview: Two brothers, Ray and Pot, exercise their bank robbing talents. They rob and get robbed in rapid succession. After acquiring a new partner (Steve) and accumulating a good haul, Ray is killed for the gold and Steve is captured by Lobo, a Mexican bandit.
title: His Name Was Pot, but They Called Him Allegria
